title: Waves - length of pipe from standing wave

content.description: A tuning fork with a frequency of <math alttext="260 hertz" overflow="scroll"><mn>260</mn><mspace width="0.2em"></mspace><mi>Hz</mi></math> is held near a pipe that is open at one end and closed at the other end. A standing sound wave of the fundamental harmonic is established in the pipe.
content.question: If the speed of the sound wave is <math alttext="340 meters per second" overflow="scroll"> <mn>340</mn> <mspace width="0.2em"> </mspace> <mtext>m/s</mtext> </math>, what is the length of the pipe?

skill.text: 2.B: Calculate or estimate an unknown quantity with units from known quantities, by selecting and following a logical computational pathway.
